    Kyle

    I am a Sr. Software Engineer with 8 years of professional experience. I am well versed in the JavaScript ecosystem with expertise in Node.js and Vue.js. I am also an expert Ruby on Rails developer. In my time as an engineer, I have worked with tools such as Elasticsearch, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Nightwatch, mocha, RSpec, Redis, AWS S3, Jenkins and many other web and internetworking technologies
